name: Magical Hunt
description:
This was a school project made with my friends from college for our creative coding class. We made this game in Gamemaker.

Pro-tip, play this game in Windowed mode otherwise it looks weirdly scaled up :P

Credits:
We used the Dungeontileset from 0x72 https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
Music composed by: razore3rus
Game Code by: Knrc https://knrcart.carrd.co/
